references: Related: CF 186835, CF 187582, CF 187311, CF 187466. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 1 and 2, Acre 5, Block 4, Maple Leaf Addition to Green Lake Circle; the north one-half of Lots 1, 2 and 3, Block 11, Wood's South Division of Green Lake Addition; Lots 2 and 3, Block 128, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition; and Lots 1, 2, 3 and 4, Block 7, White Center Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-181 and 17-131, respectively.
